English: Tale of Courtesan Li Wa, novel by Tang writer Bai Xingjian `白行簡~|`白~`行~简[Bai2 Xing2 jian3] along the lines of La Traviata, favorite opera plot

d.f: `唐~`代~`傳奇~`小說~。`唐~`白行簡~`撰~。`敘述~`滎~`陽~`公子~`與~`名妓~`李~`娃~`相戀~，`幾~`為~`父~`鞭~`死~，`後~`流落街頭~，`受~`李~`娃~`救治~`鼓勵~，`終於~`功成名就~，`結~`為~`夫婦~。`為~`唐~`代~`傳奇~`中的~`佳作~。

English: Tale of Courtesan Li Wa, novel by Tang writer Bai Xingjian `白行簡~|`白~`行~简[Bai2 Xing2 jian3] along the lines of La Traviata, favorite opera plot
